titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 3057) making appropriations for foreign operations, export financing, and related programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2006, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-270, by Mr. Diaz-Balart, L..

The resolution waives all points of order against the conference report to accompany H.R. 3057 and against its consideration. The rule further provides that the conference report be considered as read.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 111.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 532.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/4/2005--Passed House without amendment. Waives points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 3057) making appropriations for foreign operations, export financing, and related programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2006, and for other purposes.
